summary: Somewhere in the rocky mountains of Crete, a touching story of honour, respect, and the way of the samurai unfolds, as interpreted by an unlikely hero.
cast: Thomas Leikos|Marinela Vlahaki|Dimitris Kalogerakis|Andypas Damosidis|Manolis Konstadakakis|Solonas Katsikandarakis|Manos Kteniadakis|Nektarios Xekoukoulotakis|Manolis Koutoulakis|Donald Samba|Lendy Samba|Marios Samba|Giorgos Tomazinakis|Katerina Badogianni|Mathios Badogiannis|Giorgos Papadoulakis|Stelios Papadoulakis|Nikolaos Katzakis
title: Samoure
